name: Atera Odyssey
description:
Survive and find the broken pieces of your crashed spaceship in this 2d top down shooting game.

Made by 3 first year programming students and 1 artist : Marvin Scharding (me) William Pepin, Bryan Carmona in 72h for the Ludum Dare 46.

Game design and programming : Marvin Scharding (me) William Pepin, Bryan Carmona

Art : ZuquitAlpha
